import React from 'react'; import Slider from 'react-slick'; const RepoSection = ({ reposData }) => { const settings = { dots: true, infinite: true, speed: 500, slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1, }; return (

Github 專案

{reposData.map((repo, index) => (

{repo.name}

簡介:

{repo.description}

x{repo.stargazers_count}
x{repo.forks}
))}
); }; export default RepoSection;
